io.github.nucleuspowered.nucleus.api.service

Interface NucleusRTPService


  • public interface NucleusRTPService
    Allows for the customisation of RTP selection routines.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions
      The RTP options to pass to the routines

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      RTPKernel getDefaultKernel()
      Gets the RTPKernel that Nucleus' RTP will use.

      Uses the default RTP kernel (from getDefaultKernel() to find a random location, given the provided NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions.

      Gets the NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions that contains the current rtp configuration for a default world.

    • Method Detail

      • options

        default NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions options()
        Gets the NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions that contains the current rtp configuration for a default world.
        Returns:
        The NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions

      • options

        NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions options(@Nullable
                                     org.spongepowered.api.world.storage.WorldProperties world)
        Gets the NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions that contains the current rtp configuration for the specified world.
        Parameters:
        world - The WorldProperties, or null for defaults.
        Returns:
        The NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions

      • optionsBuilder

        NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions.Builder optionsBuilder()
        Gets the NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions that contains the current rtp configuration, but in builder format.

        Changes in the builder do not affect the configuration, this is for overriding in specific circumstances.

        Returns:
        The NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions

      • getDefaultKernel

        RTPKernel getDefaultKernel()
        Gets the RTPKernel that Nucleus' RTP will use.

        This is set by the rtp config, using the kernel's ID.

        Returns:
        The RTPKernel

      • getLocation

        default java.util.Optional<org.spongepowered.api.world.Location<org.spongepowered.api.world.World>> getLocation(@Nullable
                                                                                                                org.spongepowered.api.world.Location<org.spongepowered.api.world.World> currentLocation,
                                                                                                                org.spongepowered.api.world.World world,
                                                                                                                NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions options)
        Uses the default RTP kernel (from getDefaultKernel() to find a random location, given the provided NucleusRTPService.RTPOptions.

        Note that this may fail if the search times out. This does not indicate a failing routine.

        Parameters:
        currentLocation - The current location to base the RTP off.
        world - The world to warp to
        options - The RTP options to use
        Returns:
        The location if one was found.

      • registerKernel

        void registerKernel(RTPKernel kernel)
        Registers a kernel for use in Nucleus.
        Parameters:
        kernel - The kernel.
